name: Racket Ravager
description:
WARNING: Mac and Linux builds are untested and may not work as intended

Description

Abandoned on a planet unknown and hunted by space pirates, you, a cybernetic rabbit must fend off ever-increasing odds, construct a base to defend yourself, and survive.

Info:

This game was made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam, in a collaborative effort between me (Silvia) and comicnight. We attempted to adhere to the theme and try take our own spin on things, and unfortunately not everything made the cut.

We wanted to utilize the wild cards, however we weren't able to really stick to them by the time we hit mid-development. They did however influence the direction of the game, its setting, artstyle and its mechanics.

Regardless I hope you enjoy your time trying the game out, this was a good learning experience for us.

Credits

Massive thank you to roxy_ for lending their musical talents, here's there Bandcamp if you want to check out their works.

Devloped by SilviaFox and comicnight

Final Notes

Due to some last minute issues with a faulty github merge, there may be some issues, if you encounter any crashes PLEASE reach out to me at SilviaFox#8568 on Discord
